DOC.brief_summary: This trial is a food-effect study to assess fasted versus fed pharmacokinetics of PL2200.
DOC.criteria: Healthy normal male and female volunteers between 21 and 65 years of age. Abnormal findings on physical examination or clinical laboratories, or significant medical history. Subject with hypersensitivity or contraindications to aspirin, ibuprofen, or other nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug (NSAID).
DOC.keyword: Food-effects PK study in healthy subjects.
